    • act

      public void act​(Line2D[] obstacles, SpecialAbilities[] abilities)
      Checks the player collision between the boundaries of the map and makes sure it does not go outside the boundary. Checks to see if a player has collided and if it does then it acts in that way Checks to see if a player has picked up any of the special abilities which is basically also a collision.
      Parameters:
      obstacles - - the array of platforms on which the player can jump on
      abilities - - the array of abilities from which you can pick up

    • draw
